briefTitle: Evaluation of Two New Medical Instruments Dedicated to the Sentinel Lymph Node Technique in Case of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Sentinel Lymph Node Identification in Case of Breast Cancer. Clinical Evaluation of a New Intra-operative Probe and a Mini Gamma Camera
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The day before the surgery: Lymphoscintigraphy in a Nuclear Medicine Department
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* infiltrative breast cancer
* no suspect axillary lymph node
* no previous radiotherapy
* no previous chemotherapy
* no previous breast surgery
